name: MAKMYDAY.WAD
description: This is really good stuff for all those, who love playing DOOM just because it's fun! I put in some nice things to get and its a full level with all keys. Since this is my first level, i'm expecting some bugs, although i'd only found one. So, if you discover another, don't bother, i will find it, too. Since you cannot reach me in any way, just look out for updates on your server. They are coming!!! MAKMYDAY contains a lot of enemies, but there's always a chance to beat them. Look out for strange looking walls, they may be a secret door. Watch your back at the beginning! Perhaps you shouldn't take the chaingun in the startroom before you are sure not to forget something!!
